sentences.sentence: A barrel-chested young man entered the bedroom.
sentences.translation: 一位胸部厚实发达的年轻男子走进了卧室。

sentences.sentence: This bra will take flat-chested girls and give them exactly what they want.
sentences.translation: 这种胸罩受平胸女孩青睐，并且给她们完全想要的。

sentences.sentence: There's a self-portrait and one of me bare-chested.
sentences.translation: 其中有一幅他的自画像和一幅画我的裸上身人像。
